# Dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Build outputs
build/
dist/
.cache/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs
logs
*.log

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Temporary folders
tmp/
temp/

# Editor directories and files
.vscode/*
!.vscode/extensions.json
.idea
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw?

# GitHub Pages
_site/

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup
